item.title: Working in the U.S.: CPT & Internships | Sept. 15
item.description: Date: Monday, September 15, 2025 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Join CCPD and ISSS for an in-person workshop to learn about the internship search and the ways to get Curricular Practical Training (CPT) to work in the U.S. before graduation! This session is for both undergraduate and graduate students. Registration required!

item.title: CCPD & Western Digital HDD Teardown Workshop | Sept. 10
item.description: Join the CCPD and Western Digital for the popular HDD Teardown Workshop on Wednesday, September 10th from 5-6pm! Learn from Western Digital team members as they discuss types of cloud storage and lead you through a hands-on opportunity to disassemble a hard drive. Space is limited–register and learn more in Handshake! More information & Registration: https://rpi.joinhandshake.com/events/1789804/share_preview

item.title: “R for Python (and other…) Muggles!” RPIrates Monthly Meeting (Weds, 10 Sep, 6p, AE217)
item.description: RPIrates: The RPI R Users Group kicks off the Fall 2025 term with a review of R fundamentals useful for experienced R users but especially new users who may already have done data science on platforms such as Python. In this session we’ll focus on R data structures, subsetting, control structures, functions and vectorization. RPIrates is led by Dr. John S. Erickson, Director of Research Operations with the Rensselaer FOCI and Chief Instigator of RPIrates. Pizza and salad starts at 5:30p
item.author: Community

item.title: DotCIO announces upcoming upgrade to SIS
item.description: Members of DotCIO’s Enterprise Information Services team are pleased to announce upcoming changes to SIS (Student Information System) on Wednesday September 17. This upgrade brings a fresh look, improved navigation, and a more user-friendly experience. Please click in for a link to a short video providing a tour of the new landing page and where to find the tools you use most.

item.title: Faculty and Staff In-Person Workshop: Get Wise with the Owl | Sept. 15
item.description: Date: Monday, September 15, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - Discover how to make the most of your Meeting Owl! Whether your department already has an Owl or you’re considering one, this hands-on workshop will walk you through everything you need to know — from setup and placement to an overview of benefits and key features like 360° video, automatic speaker tracking, and pairing devices. Please register using the Event URL in the See section of the calendar event.

item.title: Registration Deadline for the 2nd annual Finance Conference
item.description: Date: Monday, September 22, 2025 12:00 AM - Tue , September 23, 2025 1:00 AM - RPI’s Division of Finance is excited to announce the 2nd annual Finance Conference on October 1, 2025. Come explore a curated lineup of interactive sessions designed to advance your professional skills and deepen your understanding of critical topics in higher education. From finance and data to leadership and IA, there’s something for every learner. The registration deadline is September 22, 2025.
